whyWeBuiltThis.story:
I grew up poor in Rio de Janeiro. I worked since I was 9. Mowing lawns, cleaning pools, selling snacks at football games.

My grandmother taught me to save half of everything. She did the same her whole life.

She died with nothing.

Three years ago, I decided to understand why. What I learned made me angry: the system is designed to keep ordinary people out. Banks take your money, earn returns, and give you almost nothing back.
whyWeBuiltThis.mission: diBoaS is the answer I wish my grandmother had.

faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about diBoaS.

safety.question: Is my money safe?
safety.answer:
Here's what most people don't know: When you put money in a bank, it's not really "yours" anymore. Legally, it becomes the bank's. They lend it out, invest it, and give you 0.5% for the privilege.

With diBoaS, your funds stay in your own non-custodial wallet. We can't touch your money. We just show you where to put it so it works harder for you.

The protocols we use (Aave, Compound) have secured billions of dollars and been battle-tested for years.

risks.question: What are the risks?
risks.answer:
Let's be honest: DeFi yields are not bank deposits. Smart contract risk exists. We only use battle-tested protocols with $10B+ in assets, but no investment is risk-free.

That's why we say: Start with what you won't miss. Even €5 is enough to begin.

withdraw.question: Can I withdraw anytime?
withdraw.answer:
Yes. No lock-ups. No penalties. Your money is always accessible. Withdrawals typically complete same day.

This is your money. We believe you should always have access to it.

revenue.question: How do you make money?
revenue.answer:
We take a small fee (0.12%) when you earn. If you don't earn, we don't earn.

Our success depends on your success. That's how it should be.

crypto.question: Do I need to understand crypto?
crypto.answer:
No. We handle all the complexity. You just see your money growing. No wallets, no seed phrases, no confusing charts.

Think of it like this: You don't need to know how a car engine works to drive. You just need to know it gets you where you're going.

regulation.question: Is this regulated?
regulation.answer:
Yes. We operate under the EU's MiCA framework with planned CASP authorization. We only use protocols with over $10 billion in total value locked and multiple security audits.

German thoroughness meets fair finance.

pix.answer: Yes! Deposits and withdrawals via PIX. Simple as that.
